summary: An overweight lab technician with low self esteem, brought on by his dominant mother, becomes a serial killer of female nurses.
cast: Victor Buono|David McLean|Diane Sayer|Davey Davison|Baynes Barron|Ellen Corby|Michael Ryan|Russ Bender|Jeanne Bates|Wally Campo|Mimi Dillard|Byron Morrow|John Yates|James Sikking|Robert Cranford|Selette Cole|Fred Aldrich|Benjie Bancroft|Fred Fisher|Kenner G. Kemp|Victor Masi
title: El estrangulador de mujeres
